mapper.select: select * from member where member_id=#{memberId} and member_pass=#{memberPass}
mapper.insert: insert into member( member_id, member_pass, member_name, local_address, detail_address, phone_no, email, profile_image ) values( #{memberId}, #{memberPass}, #{memberName}, #{localAddress}, #{detailAddress}, #{phoneNo}, #{email}, #{profileImage})
